snippet: A study published in the journal Limnology and Oceanography looked at production declines at an Oregon oyster hatchery and carbon dioxide, which causes acidification of seawater.
abstract: A study published in the journal Limnology and Oceanography looked at production declines at an Oregon oyster hatchery and carbon dioxide, which causes acidification of seawater.

headline.main: Study Links Raised Carbon Dioxide Levels to Oyster Die-Offs
